data.eml:eml: Contribution to the study of the genus Stethantyx Townes (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae), with the description of a new species from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I. (2017): Contribution to the study of the genus Stethantyx Townes (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae), with the description of a new species from Brazil. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 55: 129-138, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.55.5322, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.55.5322
